cast.original_title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
cast.overview: Raoul Duke and his attorney Dr. Gonzo drive a red convertible across the Mojave desert to Las Vegas with a suitcase full of drugs to cover a motorcycle race. As their consumption of drugs increases at an alarming rate, the stoned duo trash their hotel room and fear legal repercussions. Duke begins to drive back to L.A., but after an odd run-in with a cop, he returns to Sin City and continues his wild drug binge.
cast.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas

cast.overview: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.
cast.title: Law Abiding Citizen

cast.overview: Charlie Kaufman is a confused L.A. screenwriter overwhelmed by feelings of inadequacy, sexual frustration, self-loathing, and by the screenwriting ambitions of his freeloading twin brother Donald. While struggling to adapt "The Orchid Thief," by Susan Orlean, Kaufman's life spins from pathetic to bizarre. The lives of Kaufman, Orlean's book, become strangely intertwined as each one's search for passion collides with the others'.
cast.title: Adaptation.

cast.overview: An ex-fighter pilot forced to take over the controls of an airliner when the flight crew succumbs to food poisoning.
cast.title: Airplane!

details.biography:
Gregory Martin Itzin (April 20, 1948 – July 8, 2022) was an American character actor of film and television, perhaps best known for his role as Charles Logan in the action thriller series 24.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Gregory Itzin, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
details.name: Gregory Itzin
